snoopy.blindnote: SCARNA16 is registered based on snoRNABase. Does snOPY include SCARNA ? (20100615末安)genomic positionを変更した,accession No を加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseがアクセスできないため未確認。(20100617末安)genomic positionを更新した,evidenceをsnoRNAbaseを参考に加えた。 (20100906末安)UCSCの情報を基にchromosome or contig nameを16→17に変更した。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss, A. M., Jady, B. E., Bertrand, E., and Kiss, T. (2004). Human box H/ACA pseudouridylation guide RNA machinery. Mol. Cell .Biol. 24, 5797-5807, Richard, P., Darzacq, X., Bertrand, E., Jady, B. E., Verheggen, C., and Kiss, T. (2003). A common sequence motif determines the Cajal body-specific localization of box H/ACA scaRNAs. Embo J, 22, 4283-4293, Reddy, R., Henning, D., and Busch, H. (1981a). Pseudouridine residues in the 5'-terminus of uridine-rich nuclear RNA I (U1 RNA). Biochem Biophys Res Commun, 98, 1076-1083.
